title: Emoji have entered the chat. Is that a good thing for electronic health records?
description: New research asks if emoji use in clinical records could impact patient understanding, perceived professionalism, and legal liability.
content: New research asks if emoji use in clinical records could impact patient understanding, perceived professionalism, and legal liability.
